.. _InstallSphinx:

===================================
How to Install Sphinx on projects
===================================

1. Install wsl onto your pc in order to run linux commands in powershell

.. note:: Enter
   wsl --install

2. Ensure Linux Distro is present after install of wsl. 
   *   Default distro is Ubuntu 22.04
   *   You can change to the Distro of your choice

3. Start wsl in powershell

.. note:: Enter
   wsl

4. Install Sphinx

.. note:: Enter
   apt-get install sphinx

   

5. Check version of Python

.. note:: Enter
   python - -version

6. Install pip

.. note:: Enter
   apt-get install pip

7. Ensure pip is installed

.. note:: Enter
   pip -V
